alert.note: Alert for Bronx; Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens; Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Queens; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 2:03PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hudson, southeastern Bergen, southeastern Essex, south central Westchester, Queens, Richmond, Bronx, Kings and New York (Manhattan) Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 201 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Jersey City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newark, Jersey City, Jamaica, New Rochelle, Flushing, Bayonne, Mott Haven, Hoboken, East Tremont, Lyndhurst, Secaucus, Harrison, Ridgefield, Todt Hill and Crown Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern New Jersey...and southeastern New York.

area.areaDesc: Bronx; Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens; Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Queens; Southern Westchester
